text: Nakugqiba ke ukwenza yonke imimiselo yeHajji, mkhumbuleni uAllâh njengoko nikhumbula ooyihlomkhulu benu kungenjalo (Mkhumbuleni uAllâh) ngenkumbulo ethe chatha. Kodwa ebantwini (apha) kukho abo bathi: “O Nkosi yethu! Siphe (izipho zaKho) kweli hlabathi!” Abanjalo abayi kuba nasabelo kuBomi oBuzayo
